name: get_tile
example_comment: The above snippet returns a the <%= type 'Tile' %> to the left of this one.
description: Returns a <%= type 'Tile' %> offset in one direction from this <%= type 'Tile' %>.
If this offset goes out of bounds, or is to an otherwise invalid <%= type 'Tile' %>, it returns `nil` instead.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.desc: The direction you want to retrieve the <%= type 'Tile' %> from.

parameters.name: distance
parameters.desc: The number of spaces (min: 0) in that direction you want to retrieve the <%= type 'Tile' %> from.
